urls.description: Source: FRAN and JORA data as of October 2021. The data presented refer to detections of illegal border-crossing rather than the number of persons, as the same person may cross the external border several times. However, there is currently no EU system in place capable of tracing each person‚Äôs movements following an illegal border-crossing. Therefore, it is not possible to establish the precise number of persons who have illegally crossed the external border. We use cookies on our website to support
